title: The Most Powerful Mini Gaming PC...
description: With an Intel CPU and AMD RX Vega M graphics, the Hades Canyon NUC is a dope gaming PC. Can You Play Fortnite on a $200 Laptop?  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:  Facebook:   An Overclock Media Production  Presented by Austin Evans  Producer: Kenneth Bolido Editor: Jimmy Champane
